problem_names: lemma unfold_stream_siterate_smap: "unfold_stream f g = smap f \<circ> siterate g"

lemma lappend_stream_of_llist:
    assumes "lfinite u"
    shows "stream_of_llist (u $ v) = list_of u @- stream_of_llist v"
lemma llist_of_inf_llist_prefix[intro]: "u \<le>\<^sub>F\<^sub>I v \<Longrightarrow> llist_of u \<le> llist_of_stream v"
lemma prefix_llist_of_inf_llist[intro]: "lfinite u \<Longrightarrow> u \<le> v \<Longrightarrow> list_of u \<le>\<^sub>F\<^sub>I stream_of_llist v"

lemma lproject_prefix_limit_chain:
    assumes "chain w" "\<And> k. lproject A (llist_of (w k)) \<le> x"
    shows "lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit w)) \<le> x"

lemma lproject_eq_limit_chain:
    assumes "chain u" "chain v" "\<And> k. project A (u k) = project A (v k)"
    shows "lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u)) = lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))"
translations: lemma unfold_stream_siterate_smap: "unfold_stream f g = smap f \<circ> siterate g"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. unfold_stream f g = smap f \<circ> siterate g
by (rule, coinduction, auto) (metis unfold_stream_eq_SCons)+

lemma lappend_stream_of_llist:
    assumes "lfinite u"
    shows "stream_of_llist (u $ v) = list_of u @- stream_of_llist v"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. stream_of_llist (u $ v) = list_of u @- stream_of_llist v
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  lfinite u

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. stream_of_llist (u $ v) = list_of u @- stream_of_llist v
unfolding stream_of_llist_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  lfinite u

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. unfold_stream lhd ltl (u $ v) = list_of u @- unfold_stream lhd ltl v
by induct auto
lemma llist_of_inf_llist_prefix[intro]: "u \<le>\<^sub>F\<^sub>I v \<Longrightarrow> llist_of u \<le> llist_of_stream v"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. u \<le>\<^sub>F\<^sub>I v \<Longrightarrow>
    llist_of u \<le> llist_of_stream v
by (metis lappend_llist_of_stream_conv_shift le_llist_conv_lprefix lprefix_lappend prefix_fininfE)
lemma prefix_llist_of_inf_llist[intro]: "lfinite u \<Longrightarrow> u \<le> v \<Longrightarrow> list_of u \<le>\<^sub>F\<^sub>I stream_of_llist v"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>lfinite u; u \<le> v\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> list_of u \<le>\<^sub>F\<^sub>I stream_of_llist v
by (metis lappend_stream_of_llist le_llist_conv_lprefix lprefix_conv_lappend prefix_fininfI)

lemma lproject_prefix_limit_chain:
    assumes "chain w" "\<And> k. lproject A (llist_of (w k)) \<le> x"
    shows "lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit w)) \<le> x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit w)) \<le> x
proof (rule lproject_prefix_limit')

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>k.
       \<exists>v\<le>llist_of_stream (limit w).
          enat k < llength v \<and> lproject A v \<le> x
fix k

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>k.
       \<exists>v\<le>llist_of_stream (limit w).
          enat k < llength v \<and> lproject A v \<le> x
obtain l where 1: "k < length (w l)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>l. k < length (w l) \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using assms(1)

proof (prove)
using this:
  chain w

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>l. k < length (w l) \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by rule

proof (state)
this:
  k < length (w l)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>k.
       \<exists>v\<le>llist_of_stream (limit w).
          enat k < llength v \<and> lproject A v \<le> x
show "\<exists> v \<le> llist_of_stream (limit w). enat k < llength v \<and> lproject A v \<le> x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>v\<le>llist_of_stream (limit w).
       enat k < llength v \<and> lproject A v \<le> x
proof (intro exI conjI)

proof (state)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. ?v \<le> llist_of_stream (limit w)
 2. enat k < llength ?v
 3. lproject A ?v \<le> x
show "llist_of (w l) \<le> llist_of_stream (limit w)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. llist_of (w l) \<le> llist_of_stream (limit w)
using llist_of_inf_llist_prefix chain_prefix_limit assms(1)

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?u \<le>\<^sub>F\<^sub>I ?v \<Longrightarrow>
  llist_of ?u \<le> llist_of_stream ?v
  chain ?w \<Longrightarrow> ?w ?k \<le>\<^sub>F\<^sub>I limit ?w
  chain w

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. llist_of (w l) \<le> llist_of_stream (limit w)
by this

proof (state)
this:
  llist_of (w l) \<le> llist_of_stream (limit w)

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. enat k < llength (llist_of (w l))
 2. lproject A (llist_of (w l)) \<le> x
show "enat k < llength (llist_of (w l))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. enat k < llength (llist_of (w l))
using 1

proof (prove)
using this:
  k < length (w l)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. enat k < llength (llist_of (w l))
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  enat k < llength (llist_of (w l))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lproject A (llist_of (w l)) \<le> x
show "lproject A (llist_of (w l)) \<le> x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lproject A (llist_of (w l)) \<le> x
using assms(2)

proof (prove)
using this:
  lproject A (llist_of (w ?k)) \<le> x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lproject A (llist_of (w l)) \<le> x
by this

proof (state)
this:
  lproject A (llist_of (w l)) \<le> x

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>v\<le>llist_of_stream (limit w).
     enat k < llength v \<and> lproject A v \<le> x

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma lproject_eq_limit_chain:
    assumes "chain u" "chain v" "\<And> k. project A (u k) = project A (v k)"
    shows "lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u)) = lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u)) =
    lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))
proof (rule antisym)

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u))
    \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))
 2. lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))
    \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u))
show "lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u)) \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u))
    \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))
proof (rule lproject_prefix_limit_chain)

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. chain u
 2. \<And>k.
       lproject A (llist_of (u k))
       \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))
show "chain u"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. chain u
using assms(1)

proof (prove)
using this:
  chain u

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. chain u
by this

proof (state)
this:
  chain u

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>k.
       lproject A (llist_of (u k))
       \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))
next

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>k.
       lproject A (llist_of (u k))
       \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))
fix k

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>k.
       lproject A (llist_of (u k))
       \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))
have "lproject A (llist_of (u k)) = lproject A (llist_of (v k))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lproject A (llist_of (u k)) = lproject A (llist_of (v k))
using assms(3)

proof (prove)
using this:
  project A (u ?k) = project A (v ?k)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lproject A (llist_of (u k)) = lproject A (llist_of (v k))
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  lproject A (llist_of (u k)) = lproject A (llist_of (v k))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>k.
       lproject A (llist_of (u k))
       \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))
also

proof (state)
this:
  lproject A (llist_of (u k)) = lproject A (llist_of (v k))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>k.
       lproject A (llist_of (u k))
       \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))
have "\<dots> \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lproject A (llist_of (v k)) \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))
using chain_prefix_limit assms(2)

proof (prove)
using this:
  chain ?w \<Longrightarrow> ?w ?k \<le>\<^sub>F\<^sub>I limit ?w
  chain v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lproject A (llist_of (v k)) \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  lproject A (llist_of (v k)) \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>k.
       lproject A (llist_of (u k))
       \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))
finally

proof (chain)
picking this:
  lproject A (llist_of (u k)) \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))
show "lproject A (llist_of (u k)) \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))"

proof (prove)
using this:
  lproject A (llist_of (u k)) \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lproject A (llist_of (u k)) \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))
by this

proof (state)
this:
  lproject A (llist_of (u k)) \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

proof (state)
this:
  lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u))
  \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))
    \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u))
show "lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v)) \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))
    \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u))
proof (rule lproject_prefix_limit_chain)

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. chain v
 2. \<And>k.
       lproject A (llist_of (v k))
       \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u))
show "chain v"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. chain v
using assms(2)

proof (prove)
using this:
  chain v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. chain v
by this

proof (state)
this:
  chain v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>k.
       lproject A (llist_of (v k))
       \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u))
next

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>k.
       lproject A (llist_of (v k))
       \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u))
fix k

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>k.
       lproject A (llist_of (v k))
       \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u))
have "lproject A (llist_of (v k)) = lproject A (llist_of (u k))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lproject A (llist_of (v k)) = lproject A (llist_of (u k))
using assms(3)

proof (prove)
using this:
  project A (u ?k) = project A (v ?k)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lproject A (llist_of (v k)) = lproject A (llist_of (u k))
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  lproject A (llist_of (v k)) = lproject A (llist_of (u k))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>k.
       lproject A (llist_of (v k))
       \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u))
also

proof (state)
this:
  lproject A (llist_of (v k)) = lproject A (llist_of (u k))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>k.
       lproject A (llist_of (v k))
       \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u))
have "\<dots> \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lproject A (llist_of (u k)) \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u))
using chain_prefix_limit assms(1)

proof (prove)
using this:
  chain ?w \<Longrightarrow> ?w ?k \<le>\<^sub>F\<^sub>I limit ?w
  chain u

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lproject A (llist_of (u k)) \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u))
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  lproject A (llist_of (u k)) \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>k.
       lproject A (llist_of (v k))
       \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u))
finally

proof (chain)
picking this:
  lproject A (llist_of (v k)) \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u))
show "lproject A (llist_of (v k)) \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u))"

proof (prove)
using this:
  lproject A (llist_of (v k)) \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lproject A (llist_of (v k)) \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u))
by this

proof (state)
this:
  lproject A (llist_of (v k)) \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u))

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

proof (state)
this:
  lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit v))
  \<le> lproject A (llist_of_stream (limit u))

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
